text:
Question 170) In the books Harry Potter, an anagram of the name of the character “Tom Marvolo Riddle” generated the phrase “I Am Lord Voldemort”.
Suppose Harry wanted to form all the anagrams of the phrase “I Am Potter”, in such a way that vowels and consonants always appear interspersed, and without considering the spacing between the letters.
Under these conditions, the number of anagrams formed is given by
A) 9!
B) 4! 5!
C) 2 × 4! 5!
D) 9! two
E) 4! 5! two
